extendedInfo.description: *** You can hide messages from a single contact in this Lite version ***The app hides text messages / sms from selected contacts. It's disguised as "FuzzyBalls". When you open the app, you would see bouncing balls. It's really cool. But wait till you see what happens when you shake the mobile. There is whole new world behind those 'bouncing balls'.Shake the mobile, enter password and you are in. Here you can do settings, send text messages, check the hidden messages. No one will come to know that anything like text/sms hiding app even exists on the phone! Even notifications are disguised.Features1. Disguised as FuzzyBalls (Bouncing balls)2. FuzzyBalls is really cool & engaging activity in itself. It looks like a true application.3. Check hidden messages. 4. Select as many contacts as you wish whose messages you want to hide.5. Backup in XML & txt format. 6. Import facility. (Even if you lose your hidden messages, you can restored them back by importing xml file.)7. Notification for new text messages. It will say "FuzzyBalls" update available whenever you get new text message.8. Undo sms option.9. Strong shake event. So even if 'by mistake' some one shakes mobile slowly, your cover would not be exposed. :-)10. Option to enable sounds / vibrations on notification.11. Create a totally hidden contact which will not interfere with any other app in any way.We are in process of adding many more features. Tune in. Do share your suggestions with us. If you come across any issues, mail us rather than putting any comments, so that we can work towards solving the issue.

reviews.title: Shake...?
reviews.comment: Shaling like a 12 year old boy but to no avail.... Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not very stealthy when you have to shake the phone. Plus only one contact... next
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When I shake my phone it doesn\'t do anything :-( really was looking forward to using the app! :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Liked this one. In fact i upgraded to \'ultimate privacy app\' f d same developrs. Its way more powerful than this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love it but I don\'t think it hides pic messages
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Texts arent hidden right away.You can still read texts in status bar until you click on either the text or fuzzy balls notification - MyTouch 3G Slide
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this app but when using it with chomp sms it keeps running my cpu to the max making my phone slow as hell. Moto milestone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If this hid mms as well it would be perfect...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good in theory, but honestly it just ends up shouting \"Hiding Something!\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Didn\'t send texts to recipents. Text sent from other person were lost. Unreliable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I suggest changing the name so in the my installed apps section of media it doesn\'t draw attention n say what it is

reviews.comment: This app is really bomb. Best customer service ever seen on Android Market.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When u get to the password spot, u can just hit the back button and it let\'s u in without a password...not cool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wish I could hide more then one person. Also it doesn\'t lock the notifications unless you close the app after every use. HTC EVO

reviews.comment: Shakes hard as I can still nothing
